Code Runner

Interactive code execution with syntax highlighting:

Fibonacci Example
                def fibonacci(n):
                    a, b = 0, 1
                    for _ in range(n):
                        print(a, end=' ')
                        a, b = b, a + b

                fibonacci(10)
                const numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5];
                const doubled = numbers.map(n => n * 2);
                console.log("Doubled:", doubled);
